content.rendered:
Bek Air – Ceased operations on 17 April 2020

Bek Air is an airline in Kazakhstan. Bek Air was founded in 1999 as a business jet operator. In 2008, Bek Air purchased stock of shares in Oral Ak Zhol Airport which is currently a base airport for the company. Bek Air has committed to investing KZT10 million a month in order to reconstruct the airport’s runway which is in poor condition.

 

Queries handled by Bek Air Airlines Customer care:

Schedule, eBooking, Rescheduling, Track and Trace, Charter Service Queries, Trucking service Queries, e-claims Flight Information, Missing Luggage, Delayed Flights. Pharma, pets, valuable, perishable goods and extra care shipment queries.

List of Bek Air Airlines Offices :

Kazakhstan – Almaty
Kazakhstan – Nur-sultan
Kazakhstan – Uralsk
Kazakhstan – Atyrau
Kazakhstan – Aktau
Kazakhstan – Shymkent
Kazakhstan – Kyzylorda
Kazakhstan – Aktobe

Is there any problem / complaint with reaching the Bek Air Airlines Address or Phone number? Please report any issues using the below comment form.

Rate your experience with the Bek Air Airlines: (click on the stars below)
